thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 23 of 7163
thread.title: Lori

author: Lori
title: Lori
text: My husband and I have had the opportunity to work with B&H several times over past 10 yrs. My husband has his own small video production business. So B& H has been hit with technical, sometimes application, questions regarding mixers, cameras, etc. They never disappoint. They listen, they understand and they answer knowledgeably. In the rare case that they can't answer, they help you get to someone that can - say, the manufacturer of a product they sell. My husband and I will continue to do business with B&H for the caliber of their customer service alone.
